example.name: PancakeSwap

example.name: BakerySwap
example.description: BakerySwap is the all-in-one DeFi platform that provides both AMM and NFT Marketplace solutions in one place. Users can exchange tokens, provide liquidity, participate in liquidity farming, and also mint NFT and trade them.

example.name: Venus
example.description: A Decentralized Marketplace for Lenders and Borrowers with Borderless Stablecoins.

example.name: Bunny
example.description: Bunny - DeFi yield farming aggregator and optimizer for Binance Smart Chan (​BSC) and Ethereum (ETH).

description.en: Wrapped BNB a wrapped version of the BNB native tokens on the BEP-20 standard on the Binance Smart Chain. Not to be confused with BNB Native Token on the BSC Chain.
